metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6816 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
ganglia-web before 3.7.1 allows remote attackers to bypass authentication.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6816` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ganglia-monitor - 3.6.0-1ubuntu2
ganglia-monitor-python - 3.6.0-1ubuntu2
gmetad - 3.6.0-1ubuntu2
libganglia1 - 3.6.0-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ganglia package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.0-1ubuntu2').
ganglia-web: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
